mapper.select: select * from acco_phototb where acco_no=#{accoNo} limit 5;
select photo_no as photoNo, acco_no as accoNo, saved_name as savedName, original_name as originalName, room_no as roomNo from acco_phototb where acco_no = #{accoNo}
select acco_phototb.* from accotb inner join acco_phototb on accotb.acco_no=acco_phototb.acco_no and acco_phototb.room_no=0 where accotb.acco_no=#{accoNo};
